price: Kuma amma waɗanda fuskõkinsu suka yi fari, to sũ suna cikin rahamar Allah kuma, su a cikinta, madawwama, ne.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna ib'yaḍḍat wujūhuhum fafī raḥmati al-lahi hum fīhā khālidūna
